thread.title: Jesse Lingard set for talks over new Manchester United deal as Tottenham monitor developments
thread.title_full: Jesse Lingard set for talks over new Manchester United deal as Tottenham monitor developments

author: Steve Bates
title: Jesse Lingard set for talks over new Manchester United deal as Tottenham monitor developments
text:
Jesse Lingard set for talks over new Manchester United deal as Tottenham monitor developments The 24-year-old is one of the lowest paid members of the first-team squad at Old Trafford Share Lingard is yet to agree a long-term deal at United (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jesse Lingard will hold talks with Manchester United over a new contract this week – with Tottenham hovering in the background. 
United are keen to keep hold of the 24-year-old winger, but Lingard has yet to agree a new deal to stay at Old Trafford long-term. 
Lingard is one of the lowest paid members of the current first team squad at United and is looking to considerably boost his current financial deal after recently changing agents. 
Many of Jose Mourinho’s squad pick up more than £100,000 a week with some like Wayne Rooney, Paul Pogba and Zlatan Ibrahimovic pocketing more than double that. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
